Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[AssetPacksMan: Enables the import of locally installed mods (Mods in the user/Mods folder). These will already be loaded by the game (without icons). Activating this option may cause duplicate assets
Enables the import of subscribed asset packs.
Options.OPTION[AssetPacksManager.AssetPa: Enable Asset Pack Loading on Startup
Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[AssetPacksMan: Enables the loading of asset packs on startup. Turning this setting off will prevent the loading of asset packs on startup. You will have to load them manually.
Options.OPTION[AssetPacksManager.AssetPa: Adaptive Asset Loading (Enable when you have double custom assets, disable when you are missing assets)
Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[AssetPacksMan: Enables the loading of assets adaptively. Only assets that have not been loaded by the integrated PDX Asset Loader will be loaded, which may significantly reduce load times (up to 99%). Disable this option if you experience Black Screens, Crashes, Low FPS, missing assets or other issues.
Options.OPTION[AssetPacksManager.AssetPa: Disable warning to enable/disable adaptive asset loading
Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[AssetPacksMan: Enable this setting to disable the warning that asks for duplicate or missing assets.
Options.OPTION[AssetPacksManager.AssetPa: Disable telemetry (APM only collects data about the number of asset packs and the adaptive loading setting, no personal data)
Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[AssetPacksMan: Disables telemetry. APM only collects data about the number of asset packs and the adaptive loading setting. If a majority of users have adaptive loading enabled, the feature will be enabled by default in future versions.
Loads the asset packs. This will load the asset packs that are enabled in the settings.
Choose the amount of information that is logged. Cascading, Level Warning includes Error and Critical, for example.
Automatically hides APM Notifications after 30 seconds.
Displays a warning when APM detects local assets in the user folder. This is to prevent accidental loading of local assets.
Sets the minimum time between log entries. This is to prevent the NullReferenceExceptions caused by the logger.

Sometimes helps the issue of missing CID-Files. Deletes the cache of downloaded PDX Mods. This will close the game immediately. It will not change your playset, but will require to re-download all mods on the next startup. This might take a few minutes depending on the amount of subscribed mods.
Options.WARNING[AssetPacksManager.AssetP: **WARNING. This will close your game!** Are you sure you want to delete the asset packs cache? This cannot be undone.
Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[AssetPacksMan: A less aggressive version of the Delete Mods Cache option. This will only delete mods that are missing the CID-File. This will close the game immediately. It will not change your playset, but will require to re-download all affected mods on the next startup.
Options.WARNING[AssetPacksManager.AssetP: **WARNING. This will close your game!** Are you sure you want to delete the affected mods cache? This cannot be undone.
Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[AssetPacksMan: Opens the log file of the mod in the default text editor. Log contains details about assets that failed to load.
Displays the loaded asset packs. This is a read-only field.
